ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:55:36 [Issue ID 4000-103788] urn:comicvine:4000-103788 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 23:05:54. [Issue ID 230408]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Concluding the introductory chapter of Alley Baggett1s Alley Cat! The violent slayings of prostitutes in New Orleans continues in an eerie parallel to historic events in the past. Forced to embrace her greatest fears in order to confront the tormenting demonic spirit of the Marquis de Sade, Alley1s world is shattered when she discovers the host body for the Marquis1 exploits. Not to be missed!
*Notes:* Albert Deschesne last name was spelled as Dechesne. Special center pullout photo poster. Photo by Bruce Brown and photo layout by Greg Aronowitz. Appendix: "Alley Cat" "The Malleus Maleficarum" one page text piece. Appendix: two pages featuring "First Appearance of Alley Cat", which occurred in Lady Pendragon #3. "Alley Cat No. 2 Monster Mart Edition" the only way to obtain this one of a kind special edition cover is at monstermart.com. "The Alley Cat Vs. Lady Pendragon On-Line Exclusive" you must register at wiizardmall.com to get this one. and "Alley Cat Continues in November with No. 4." This series was only intended as a three issue mini-series but due to high demand it will continue as a regular series. Also included are one photo, several covers and artwork of Alley Baggett.
